metadata.name: back
metadata.description: Go back to previous track or specified position in history.

position.name: position
position.description: The position in history to go back to.

back.trackHistoryEmpty:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
The history is empty, add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
back.trackPositionHigherThanHistoryLength_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There is only **1** track in the history. You cannot go back to track **{{backPosition}}**.

View tracks added in the history with {{historyCommand}}.
back.trackPositionHigherThanHistoryLength:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There are only **{{count}}** tracks in the history. You cannot go back to track **{{backPosition}}**.

View tracks added in the history with {{historyCommand}}.

metadata.name: filters
metadata.description: Toggle various audio filters.

filters.allFiltersDisabled:
{{icon}} **Disabled filters**
All audio filters have been disabled.
filters.selectFilterPlaceholder: Select a filter from the menu.
filters.toggleFilterInstructions:
**Toggle filters ({{provider}})**
Enable or disable audio filters for playback from the menu.

metadata.name: guilds
metadata.description: Show the top 25 guilds by member count.

metadata.name: help
metadata.description: Show the list of bot commands.

metadata.name: history
metadata.description: Show history of tracks that have been played.

page.name: page
page.description: Page number to display for the history.

history.emptyHistory: The history is empty, add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
history.invalidPageNumber_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Page **`{{page}}`** is not a valid page number.

There is only **`1`** page in the history.
history.invalidPageNumber:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Page **`{{page}}`** is not a valid page number.

There are only a total of **`{{count}}`** pages in the history.

metadata.name: join
metadata.description: The bot will join the voice channel if not already in one.

join.alreadyConnected:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
I am already connected to the {{channel}} voice channel.

To disconnect me from the channel, use the {{leaveCommand}} command.
join.couldNotJoin:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Could not join voice channel, please try again.

metadata.name: leave
metadata.description: Clear the queue and remove bot from voice channel.

leave.leavingChannel:
{{icon}} **Leaving channel**
Cleared the track queue and left voice channel.

To play more music, use the {{playCommand}} command!

metadata.name: loop
metadata.description: Toggle looping a track, the whole queue or autoplay.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: Loop mode: Track, queue, autoplay or disabled.

loop.loopModeInformation:
{{icon}} **Current loop mode**
The looping mode is currently set to **`{{mode}}`**.
loop.modeChanged:
{{icon}} **Loop mode changed**
Changing loop mode from **`{{fromName}}`** to **`{{toName}}`**.
loop.willAutoplay: When the queue is empty, similar tracks will start playing!
loop.willNoLongerPlay: The {{mode}} will no longer play on repeat!
loop.willNowPlay: The {{mode}} will now play on repeat!

metadata.name: lyrics
metadata.description: Search Genius lyrics for current or specified track.

query.name: query
query.description: Search query by text or URL.

lyrics.noLyricsFound:
{{icon}} **No lyrics found**
There were no Genius lyrics found for track **{{query}}**.

metadata.name: move
metadata.description: Move a track to a specified position in queue.

from.name: from
from.description: The position of the track to move.

to.name: to
to.description: The position to move the track to.

move.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
You cannot move the track in position **`{{fromPosition}}`** to position **`{{toPosition}}`**. There is only **`1`** track in the queue.

View tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.
move.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
You cannot move the track in position **`{{fromPosition}}`** to position **`{{toPosition}}`**. There are only **`{{count}}`** tracks in the queue.

View tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.

metadata.name: nowplaying
metadata.description: Show information about the current track.

metadata.name: pause
metadata.description: Toggle pause for the current track.

metadata.name: play
metadata.description: Add a track or playlist to the queue by search query or URL.

query.name: query
query.description: Search query by text or URL.

play.playlistAddedTrackCount_one: And **1** more track... Use {{queueCommand}} to view all.
play.playlistAddedTrackCount: And **{{count}}** more tracks... Use {{queueCommand}} to view all.
play.playlistTooLarge:
{{icon}} **Playlist too large**
This playlist is too large to be added to the queue.

The maximum amount of tracks that can be added to the queue is **{{count}}**.
play.trackNotFound:
{{icon}} **No track found
No results found for **{{query}}**.

If you specified a URL, please make sure it is valid and public.

metadata.name: queue
metadata.description: Show tracks that have been added to the queue.

page.name: page
page.description: Page number to display for the queue.

queue.emptyQueue: The queue is empty, add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
queue.estimatedReallyLongTime: Estimated duration: A really long time
queue.invalidPageNumber_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Page **`{{page}}`** is not a valid page number.

There is only **`1`** page in the queue.
queue.invalidPageNumber:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Page **`{{page}}`** is not a valid page number.

There are only a total of **`{{count}}`** pages in the queue.

metadata.name: reload
metadata.description: Reload slash command, autocomplete and component interactions across shards.

reload.unableToReload:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
_Hmm..._ It seems I am unable to reload the interaction module across shards.

remove.noTracksRemoved:
{{icon}} **No tracks removed**
There were no tracks removed from the queue. Please check if the option you selected has tracks to remove.
remove.removedTracks:
{{icon}} **Removed tracks**
**`{{count}}`** tracks were removed from the queue.
remove.startPositionHigherThanEndPosition:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Start position **`{{start}}`** is higher than end position **`{{end}}`**. Please specify a valid range.

View tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.
remove.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Position **`{{position}}`** is not a valid track position. There is only a total of **`1`** track in the queue.

View the tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.
remove.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
Position **`{{position}}`** is not a valid track position. There are only a total of **`{{count}}`** tracks in the queue.

View the tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.

metadata.name: seek
metadata.description: Seek to a time position in the current track.

seek.correctFormatInstruction:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
You entered an invalid duration format, **`{{wrongDuration}}`**.
Please use the format **`HH:mm:ss`**, **`mm:ss`** or **`ss`**.

**Examples:**
- **`/seek`** **`1:24:12`** - Seek to 1 hour, 24 minutes and 12 seconds.
- **`/seek`** **`3:27`** - Seek to 3 minutes and 27 seconds.
- **`/seek`** **`42`** - Seek to 42 seconds.
seek.durationLongerThanTrackDuration:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
You entered **`{{wrongDuration}}`**, which is a timestamp longer than the duration of the current track.

Please try a timestamp that is less than the duration of the track (**{{trackDuration}}**).
seek.seekingToTimestamp:
{{icon}} **Seeking to timestamp**
Seeking to **`{{duration}}`** in current track.

metadata.name: shards
metadata.description: Show information about all connected shards.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: What to sort the shards by.

page.name: page
page.description: Page number to display for the shards.

metadata.name: shuffle
metadata.description: Randomly shuffle all tracks in the queue.

shuffle.shuffledTracks:
{{icon}} **Shuffled queue tracks**
The **{{count}}** tracks in the queue have been shuffled.

View the new queue order with {{queueCommand}}.

metadata.name: skip
metadata.description: Skip track to next or specified position in queue.

position.name: position
position.description: The position in queue to skip to.

skip.emptyQueue:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
The queue is empty, add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
skip.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength_one:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There is only **1** track in the queue. You cannot skip to track **{{position}}**.

View tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.
skip.trackPositionHigherThanQueueLength:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There are only **{{count}}** tracks in the queue. You cannot skip to track **{{position}}**.

View tracks added to the queue with {{queueCommand}}.

metadata.name: status
metadata.description: Show operational status of the bot.

metadata.name: stop
metadata.description: Clear the queue and stop playing audio.

stop.stoppedPlaying:
{{icon}} **Stopped playing**
Stopped playing the audio and cleared the track queue.

To play more music, use the {{playCommand}} command!

metadata.name: systemstatus
metadata.description: Show operational status of the bot with additional technical information.

metadata.name: volume
metadata.description: Show or change the playback volume for tracks.

volume.invalidVolumeRange:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
You cannot set the volume to **`{{wrongVolume}}%`**, please pick a value between **`1%`** and **`100%`**.
volume.volumeChanged:
{{icon}} **Volume changed**
Playback volume has been changed to **`{{volume}}%`**.
volume.volumeInformation:
{{icon}} **Playback volume**
The playback volume is currently set to **`{{volume}}`**.
volume.volumeMuted:
{{icon}} **Audio muted**
Playback audio has been muted, because the volume was set to **`0%`**.

musicPlayerCommon.loopingInfo:
{{icon}} **Looping**
Loop mode is set to **`{{loopMode}}`**. You can change it with {{loopCommand}}.

validation.cannotJoinVoiceOrTalk:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
I do not have permission to play audio in the voice channel {{channel}}.

Please make sure I have the **`Connect`** and **`Speak`** permissions in this voice channel.
validation.cannotSendMessageInChannel:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
I do not have permission to send message replies in the channel {{channel}}.

Please make sure I have the **`View Channel`** permission in this text channel.
validation.historyDoesNotExist:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There are no tracks in the history and nothing currently playing. First add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
validation.notInVoiceChannel:
{{icon}} **Not in a voice channel**
You need to be in a voice channel to perform this action.
validation.notValidGuildId:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
No permission to perform this action.

The command {{command}} cannot be executed in this server.
validation.queueDoesNotExist:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There are no tracks in the queue and nothing currently playing. First add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
validation.queueIsEmpty:
{{icon}} **Oops!
There are no tracks added to the queue. First add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
validation.queueNoCurrentTrack:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
There is nothing currently playing. First add some tracks with {{playCommand}}!
validation.trackNotPlayingAnymore:
{{icon}} **Oops!**
This track has been skipped or is no longer playing.
